concept.title: List of Materials Required for Platen Repair and Maintenance
concept.shortdesc: Multiple materials are required for the successful repair and maintenance of your typewriters' platen roller.

section.title: General Materials
section.p: You will need the following materials for all typewriter platen repairs.

ul.li: A portable Smith Corona Manual typewriter

section.title: Platen Refinishing Materials
section.note: The diameter of the black rubber heat shrink tubing will depend on your platen roller size, but 2 inches is generally acceptable.
